metadata.title: CVE-2024-3854 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In some code patterns the JIT incorrectly optimized switch statements andgenerated code with out-of-bounds-reads. This vulnerability affects Firefox< 125, Firefox ESR < 115.10, and Thunderbird < 115.10.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
